item.title: La Magia e la Storia dei Luoghi siamo Noi
item.author: Luca Cipressi
item.description: A live performance of theatre, music and dance along a photographic exhibit where sixteen photographers showcased their themed visual short-stories through their images, lead by the professional photographer Pino Giannini. Each tale begun with a narration by Alessandra Arcieri, with her voice setting the rightful mood, moments before a musical comment by Yours Truly started to engulf the theatre hall, with compelling beats and expressive textures paying hommage to the visual identity. The blindfolded dancer Bruna Cerasa coreographed with her harmonic movements and sudden twitches, thrills and body postures, the physical rendition of the stories.
